guildProperty.name: bot name
guildProperty.updateMessage: You can now call me %s. My new name may be used as command prefix.

guildProperty.name: default source
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the default search source to %s

guildProperty.name: default list source
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the default list search source to %s

guildProperty.name: argument prefix
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the argument prefix to '%1$s'. Commands now look like this: $botify play %1$sspotify %1$salbum meteora. The default prefix "$" still works as a fallback. All presets containing argument prefixes have been updated.

guildProperty.name: message timeout
guildProperty.updateMessage: Set the amount of seconds after which temporary messages are deleted to %s. (0 means no timeout)

guildProperty.name: default channel
guildProperty.updateMessage: Default text channel set to id %s
